subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: In 1929, my Uncle Philly, who worked the stadium snack bars as a lifelong employee of the concessionaire Harry M. Stevens, arranged for my mother, then 12, to have her picture taken with the Babe.
snippet: In 1929, my Uncle Philly, who worked the stadium snack bars as a lifelong employee of the concessionaire Harry M. Stevens, arranged for my mother, then 12, to have her picture taken with the Babe.
